I was craving Korean food while visiting Spain and gave into going for one korean meal during my visit to Barcelona.  This restaurant hours are very weird.  I first went by the website hours and they had closed early for lunch hrs.  I then went back for dinner time thinking they were going to be open for sure and they were closed again w/o any signs explaining against their posted business hrs.  Be sure to call before heading out to this restaurant and speak to a person to confirm the hours.
